# desiredViewingMode

**Instance Property**

The viewer’s selected content-viewing mode.

## Declaration

```swift
var desiredViewingMode: VideoPlaybackController.ViewingMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

This is the content-viewing mode that the current content-viewing mode transitions to.

## Configuring the video player

- **isPassthroughTintingEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the passthrough camera feed is tinted, emphasizing the video content.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the passthrough camera feed is tinted, emphasizing the video content.
items.name: isPassthroughTintingEnabled
